Hoy en día la razón por la que solicita el crédito en Ceprodel es para obtener el crédito con el cual comprar la materia prima y así preparar los alimentos brindando mejor atención a sus clientes.
texts.en:
In the Estación Market in the city of León, señora Maura Estela P. has her business of making food herself and selling it in the market. It is important to point out that she is characterized by making delicious food, and for this reason, people visit her daily to buy it from her. The reason she is requesting a loan from Ceprodel is to purchase supplies to prepare her food so she can offer better attention to her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of supplies

loans.name: Siempre Amigas Group

texts.es: El grupo "siempre amigas " esta representado por la señora Maria del carmen y conformada por 14 miembros dentro del cual existe parentesco familiar entre la señora Liliana y Dunia las cuales son hermanas pero con ingresos completamente independientes. La mayoría D. los socios (as) se dedican a actividades comerciales como a la venta D. comida, psicología profesional, promotoras D. cosméticos, tienda D. barrio, venta D. ropa y otros productos más en mercados y ferias D. la ciudad. Parte D. ellas reconocen que existe gran competencia en su rubro pero con los años uno sabe como salir adelante. El destino del crédito es para la compra D. insumos y materiales para sus actividades principales D. venta D. productos. Los socios (as) tienen experiencia en grupos solidarios ya que trabajaron con instituciones parecidas a la fundación agrocapital por lo que conocen D. la responsabilidad y el compromiso que se requiere en especial con los integrantes D. su grupo.
texts.en:
The group "siempre amigas" (always friends) is represented by señora María del Carmen and is comprised of 14 members. Two of the members, Liliana and Dunia, are sisters, but they are completely independent with their incomes. The majority of the members are dedicated to commercial activities like selling food, professional psychology, promoting cosmetics, having a neighborhood store, and selling clothing and other products in the markets in the city. The women recognize that there is a lot of competition in their trades, but with experience, one learns how to get ahead. The credit will be used to purchase supplies and materials for selling their products. The members have experience in support groups since they worked with similar institutions to Fundación Agrocapital. So they are familiar with the responsibility and obligation that is required by the members of their group.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Operating capital

loans.name: Maritza Natividad

texts.es:
Maritza D. como toda mujer nicaragüense es muy trabajadora con el propósito de llevar el sustento a sus tres pequeños hijos. Ella se desempeña en el mercado la Estación de la ciudad de León por medio de la venta de verduras las cuales las inicia a comercializar desde muy tempranas horas por la mañana.

Hoy en día ella ha buscado el apoyo en Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito  que le permita la compra de las verduras para su respectiva comercialización en el mercado y de esta forma continuar con el mantenimiento de su familia e hijos que tanto requieren de su apoyo.
texts.en:
Maritza D., like every Nicaraguan woman, is very hard-working with the aim of supporting her three young children. She works in the Estación market in the city of León selling vegetables, which she starts to sell starting very early in the morning. Today she is seeking support with Ceprodel for a credit so she can buy vegetables to sell in the market and in this way continue to support her family and children that need her support so much.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of vegetables

loans.name: Silvia Irena

texts.es:
La señora Silvia Irene C. se destaca en el Mercado la Estación de la ciudad de León como vendedora de verduras dedicándose a esta actividad desde hace 20 años siendo este su único negocio con el cual mantiene a su familia compuesta por su pequeño hijo el cual tiene el deber de mantener por ser menor de edad.

La necesidad que hoy en día ella está atravesando es que necesita de inmediato la compra de las verduras y para ello ha acudido a Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito que le permita la compra y así seguir adelante en su negocio de venta de verduras comercializando estos perecederos.
texts.en:
Silvia Irene Carvahal holds forth at the Estacion market in the city of Leon as a vegetable vendor, something that she has done for the past 20 years. With this business she has cared for her family, which includes her young son whose care is her duty as he is a minor. Her current need is to immediately purchase vegetables, and for this purpose she has requested a loan through Ceprodel, which will allow her to make the purchase and continue with her vegetable sales business, selling this perishable item.

Translated from Spanish by James Comstock, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of vegetables

loans.name: Maria Jesús

texts.es:
Maria es una madre de familia de siete hijos, hoy solo se encarga de cuidar a los tres menores. Sin embargo ella sigue trabajando con la misma dedicación como cuando empezó. Su negocio trata sobre la venta de cosméticos por catálogo y a la misma vez, por las tardes, se hace cargo de vender frituras en la puerta de su casa.  

Hace un año, con la idea de generar más ingresos a su casa, se animó a empezar a vender también ropa a domicilio; sin embargo, la enfermedad que tiene desde hace mucho en la sangre agravó hace un mes, por lo que abandono este trabajo por una temporada, ya que le significa salir de su casa y no podía hacer muchos esfuerzos.

Junto a su esposo, quien trabaja como operario en una empresa de construcción, ha podido construir su casa y también mantener el hogar. Más adelante quisiera abrir un bazar en un ambiente dentro de su casa o talvez una librería.
texts.en:
Maria is mother to seven children, three of the youngest being under her care. Despite this, she keeps working with the same dedication as when she started. Her business is selling cosmetics via catalogue and, in the afternoons, selling fritters from the door of her home. A year ago, with the idea of generating more income for her home, she decided to start selling clothing door-to-door; however, a long-term blood illness worsened over the past month, so she stopped this new endeavor for a spell, since it required her to leave the house and she was not strong enough. With her husband, who works at a construction company, she has built her house and maintained her home. In the future she would like to open a bazaar within her home or perhaps a bookshop.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Carreón, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy more beauty supply products to sell.

loans.name: Los Quirquinchos Group

texts.es: El grupo "Quirquinchos" esta representado por la señora Maribel y conformado por 16 miembros, ellos van cursando su segundo ciclo en la cual demostraron responsabilidad y capacidad para administrar los fondos otorgados por la fundación Agrocapital demostrando entusiasmo y ganas de seguir trabajando para mejorar la calidad de vida de sus familias. La mayoría de los socios (as ) se dedica a la prestación de servicio pero también al comercio de productos como cristales, ropa, cosméticos por catálogos, joyas, abarrotes en tiendas de barrio  otros de acuerdo a la temporada. Dentro del rubro en la que ellos se trabajan existe mucha competencia es por eso que trabajan con prestamos para mejorar la calidad de sus productos y a la reparación de sus herramientas de trabajo para la prestación de un servicio más eficiente.
texts.en:
The "Quirquinchos" group is represented by Marbiel and consists of 16 members. They are in their second loan cycle in which they have demonstrated responsibility and shown their capacity to administrate the authorised funds from the AgroCapital foundation, demonstrating enthusiasm and wanting to continue working to improve their families' quality of life. The majority of the members work offering services but also in selling products such as glasses, clothes, catalogue cosmetics, jewellery and groceries in neighbourhood shops and sometimes according to the season. In the areas where they work there is a lot of competition and it for this reason that they work with loans to improve the quality of the products and to repair their work tools in order to offer a more efficient service.

Translated from Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Work capital

loans.name: Santos Paula

texts.es:
La señora Santos Paula M. es una dama muy trabajadora ya que desde la madrugada a muy tempranas horas del día, ella se levanta e inicia a elaborar tortillas que posteriormente son vendidas por ella misma en todo el mercado la Estación en la ciudad de León.

Con vasta experiencia en este negocio ella se ha destacado por elaborar deliciosas tortillas y es por este motivo que tiene varios clientes que le visitan para la compra de dichas tortillas. La situación que ella atraviesa en este momento es que requiere de la compra de la leña y el maíz y por esto es que ha buscado el apoyo en Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito y de esta manera continuar en su negocio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Santos Paula M. is a very hard working woman that wakes up in the wee hours of the morning to start preparing tortillas that she later sells herself in the Estacion market in the city of Léon. With extensive experience in this area, she has distinguished herself by baking delicious tortillas that have brought about a large number of clients that, faithfully, go to her to enjoy her famous dish. At this time, she is faced with the need to purchase additional wood and corn; therefore, she has sought the support from Cepodrel in order to be awarded with a credit line that will keep her business growing.

Translated from Spanish by Bertolt Cantalice, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase wood and corn.

loans.name: Huajara Group

texts.es: El grupo "Huajara" esta representado por la señora N. Salome y conformada por 11 miembros de los cuales ya participaron en anteriores grupos dentro de la Fundación agrocapital por lo que tienen experiencia en grupos solidarios y principalmente en la administración de los fondos otorgados. La mayoría de sus miembros se dedican a actividades comerciales de venta de abarrotes, comida, ropa y al transporte público urbano, es un grupo muy dinámico por lo que la competencia no les preocupa ya que manejan productos de acuerdo a la demanda del mercado para lo cual requieren capital de trabajo para mover rápido la mercadería y poner a la venta productos mas competitivos.
texts.en:
"Huajara" group is represented by N. Salome and consists of 11 members who participated in previous groups with the Agrocapital Foundation, which means they have experience of group solidarity and especially in administering the authorised funds. The majority of the members work in commercial activities selling groceries, food, clothes and urban public transport. It is a very dynamic group, who aren't worried by the competition and who manage their products according to market demand, which requires work capital in order to move merchandise rapidly and be able to sell products more competitively.

Translated from Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Work Capital

loans.name: Marili

texts.es:
Siendo muy joven,  Marili no tuvo reparos en emprender un negocio. Su principal motivan fue el cuidado de sus dos hijos. Por ellos fue que hace tres años empezó a vender jugos, pero este trabajo le demandaba mucho tiempo y ella en ese entonces tenia que ocuparse de su menor hijo que aun estaba bebe.

Es por ello que decide cambiar su negocio de venta de jugo a la venta de dulces en la puerta de su casa. Hoy ya lleva tres años trabajando con mucho empeño. Gracias a su dedicación ha podido agrandará su negocio y  actualmente no solo vende dulces sino también todo tipo de abarrotes. Hace poco ha logrado poner piso afuera de su casa para poder poner un pequeño carrito donde atiende a sus clientes.

Dentro de sus planes a corto plazo está agrandar el local de su tienda para poder vender mayores productos.
texts.en:
Being very young, Marili didn't have doubts about starting up a business. Her principle motive was the care of her two children. It was for them that three years ago she began to sell juices, but this line of work took up a lot of time and she still had to look after her youngest son who was still a baby at this time. It was for this reason that she decided to change her business and sell sweets from her house door. Today, she has been working for three years with great effort. Thanks to her dedication she has been able to expand her business and now she not only sells sweets but also all sorts of groceries. A short time ago she was able to put down a floor outside her house to construct a small stall where she can attend her customers. Among her short-term plans is a plan to expand her shop site in order to be able to sell more products.

Translated from Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To expand her shop site

loans.name: Gloria Francisa

texts.es:
La señora Gloria U. se ha dedicado con mucho esfuerzo a su negocio de venta de verduras las cuales son comercializadas por ella misma en su negocio de venta de verduras en el mercado la Estación de la ciudad de León.

Es importante destacar que ella se ha desarrollado grandemente en su negocio gracias al apoyo de Ceprodel debido a que le ha brindado créditos para la compra de las verduras y hoy en día una vez más busca el apoyo para ser beneficiada con un nuevo crédito para la compra de estos perecederos y así continuar en su desarrollo económico.
texts.en:
Gloria U. has devoted a great deal of energy to her produce business. She sells the produce herself from her shop in the "La Estación" market in the city of León. It is important to note that her business has grown significantly thanks to support from CEPRODEL, from which she has received loans to buy her product. She is currently seeking once again to benefit from the support of a new loan, so she can buy produce and continue to move ahead economically.

Translated from Spanish by Jill Heske, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy produce

loans.name: María Eva

texts.es:
La señora María Eva M. es originaria de la ciudad de León donde se dedica a laborar en el mercado la estación atendiendo su negocio de salón de belleza.

Es de suma importancia destacar que ella se ha desempeñado como excelente trabajadora en su negocio y es por esta razón que se esfuerza día a día para mejorar en este. Hoy en día ha acudido a Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito para la compra de productos de belleza como cremas, tintes, peines, gelatinas, etc. Por este motivo espera que su crédito sea otorgado y de esta forma continuar desarrollándose en su negocio.
texts.en:
María Eva M. is from the city of León, where she runs a beauty salon in the La Estación market. It is very important to emphasise that works very hard and builds strength day by day to improve the business. She has approached Ceprodel for a loan in order to purchase beauty products such as creams, tints, combs, gels etc. She hopes to receive the loan in order to continue to develop her business.

Translated from Spanish by Sally Bolton, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase beauty products

loans.name: Dominga Leisla

texts.es:
La señora Dominga S. se dedica a atender su negocio ubicado en el Mercado la estación en León siendo este una pulpería que ha logrado levantar e incrementar sus ventas gracias a sus múltiples esfuerzos.

La pulpería de la señora Dominga se caracteriza por vender todo tipo de productos desde los comestibles hasta los personales y la situación que hoy en día  atraviesa es que requiere llenar sus estantes y para ello ha acudido a Ceprodel con el propósito de ser beneficiada con un crédito para dar lugar a la compra de dichos productos y así seguir adelante en su negocio.
texts.en:
Dominga S. runs a grocery stall located in the La Estación market in the city of León. She has achieved increased sales thanks to her hard work. Dominga's grocery stall sells all types of products, from food to personal items. She currently needs to restock her shelves, and has approached Ceprodel for a loan. She will use the loan to buy merchandise, and in such a way move forward with her business.

Translated from Spanish by Sally Bolton, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase merchandise

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
A sus sesenta y un años Lucila aún sigue trabajando con la misma fuerza con la que cuando era joven lo hacia. Debido a la preocupación de mantener a sus ocho hijos ella siempre ha visto el modo de generar ingresos a su hogar.

En un inicio, además de vender comida se encargaba de atender en su tienda de abarrotes, pero al cabo de unos años  decidió que una de sus hijas se encargara de la tienda para poder dedicarse por completo a su negocio de comida. Esta decisión fue muy sabia ya que independientemente la tienda y la venta de comida han crecido.

Lucila se encarga de preparar desayunos y almuerzo para repartirlos a numerosos clientes que han ido creciendo en número conforme ella los atendía cada vez mejor. Más adelante, quisiera abrir un restaurante en su casa.
texts.en:
At the age of sixty-one, Lucila stills works with the same strength she did when she was young. Due to her concern of maintaining her eight children she has always sought ways to generate income for her home. At one point, apart from selling food, she ran her general store, but after some years she decided the leave one of her daughters in charge of the store in order to dedicate herself completely to her food selling business. This was a wise decision as both the store and the food sale businesses have grown. Lucila works to prepare breakfasts and lunches to sell to a large clientele, which has grown in number in proportion to how she has improved her customer service. In the future she would like to open a restaurant in her home.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Carreón, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy ingredients for the lunch dishes she sells.

loans.name: Ivania Patricia

texts.es:
En la ciudad de León, específicamente en el mercado La Estación, la señora Ivania G. se dedica arduamente a su negocio de pulpería donde comercializa los productos tales como aceite, jabon, huevos, pollo, entre otros.

Es importante destacar que el negocio lo ha desarrollado satisfactoriamente gracias al apoyo de Ceprodel por lo que le ha brindado créditos para invertir en tal negocio. Hoy en día una vez mas atraviesa la necesidad de invertir y para ello hace uso del apoyo brindado por Ceprodel esperando que su crédito sea otorgado y de esta forma lograr salir adelante en el negocio.
texts.en:
In the city of León, in the La Estación market specifically, Ivania G. works with great dedication in her grocery stall. She sells products such as oil, soap, eggs, chicken and other items. It is important to emphasize that she has been able to grow her business thanks to the support of Ceprodel, which has offered her loans to invest in her business. She is currently seeking a loan once again for her business, and is making use of the support offered by Ceprodel so she can move forward with her business.

Translated from Spanish by Sally Bolton, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase merchandise

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El señor Francisco C. se dedica a su negocio de pulpería el cual posee desde hace 10 largos años en el mercado la estación de la ciudad de León.

El negocio lo comenzó con pocos productos, sin embargo a medida que los años han venido transcurriendo ha logrado mejorar y salir adelante. Hoy en día espera que su crédito sea otorgado en Ceprodel  y por este motivo busca la manera de salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida tanto de él como de su familia a la que tanto ama.
texts.en:
Francisco C. runs a grocery stall in the La Estación market in the city of León, and has owned this business for 10 long years. He opened the stall with only a few products, but over the years he has been able to grow his business and move forward. He is currently seeking a loan from Ceprodel to continue to move forward and improve the living conditions for both him and his beloved family.

Translated from Spanish by Sally Bolton, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase merchandise

loans.name: Sandra Lucia

texts.es:
Sandra Lucia Narváez B. tiene la edad de 32 años, su estado civil es casada, Doña Sandra tiene 1 hijo su edad es de 15 años y cursa 5 año de secundaria, su compañero de vida labora como conductor de cabezal, sus propósitos son de idear nuevas estrategias de venta para con su negocio para que este obtenga mas afluencia de clientes sus deseos son de surtir su inventario para guardar reservas de sus productos y ofrecer una variedad para todos los gustos ya que siempre ha luchado con cumplir sus propósitos y metas dispuestas y además quiere guiar a su hijo para que este se instruya en la buena administración del negocio y a la ves sea una fuente de ingresos para su familia sus sueños son que los países que nos brindan ayuda nos sigan apoyando para que sigamos adelante con nuestros negocio ya que ellos son la fuente de inversión para los pequeños microempresarios que tratan de sacar adelante a sus familias.

La actividad económica  a la que se dedica es la venta de mercadería en general, la ubicación de su negocio es en el mercado la candelaria, el tiempo que tiene de poseer su negocio es de 5 años, ella inicio su negocio por cuenta propia por lo que necesita ya que necesitaba cubrir los diferentes gastos de su familia y empieza a ofrecer ciertos productos a sus vecinos y en las diferentes calles pero mas tarde obtiene la oportunidad de vender sus productos en lugar estable y es así como logra obtener un lugar estable para ofrecer sus productos que es en el mercado la candelaria por lo que ahora necesita un financiamiento que será utilizado para comprar productos del hogar, productos de limpieza y útiles escolares ya que se acerca la entrada a clases y necesita prepararse ya que sus clientes llegan en busca de estos productos.
texts.en:
Sandra is 32 years old and married. She has one son who is 15 years old and is completing school. Her husband works as driver. They would like to come up with new ideas to increase their sales and expand their customer base. They would like to increase their inventory so that they have products in reserve, as well as offer a greater variety to their customers. They have always worked hard and want to make sure that their son knows how to run a business so that he can also provide income for his own family one day. They hope that the support they receive from other countries will continue, as these are the source of investment for small businesses and the families they support. Their particular business is a general store, which they've run for 5 years now. Sandra began the business to help cover the household costs, selling a few products to her neighbors in the surrounding area. Later on, she had the opportunity to sell her products from a fixed location in the candelaria market. She is requesting the loan to purchase more household products, cleaning supplies, as well as school supplies because the school term is starting and her customers are starting to make requests.

Translated from Spanish by Emily Charnes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To stock more inventory in her general store, including cleaning products and school supplies as the school term is approaching.

loans.name: Estebana De La Concepcion

texts.es:
La Señora de nombre Estebana de la Concepción López V. tiene la edad de 40 años, su estado civil es casado, Doña Estebana tiene 2 hijos sus edades son las siguientes su hijo mayor de 18 años cursa el 5 año de secundaria y su otro hijo de 15 años cursa el 4 año de secundaria, su esposo labora como agricultor, sus propósitos son de mantener su negocio activo por lo que ya que tiene que seguir proporcionándoles estudios a sus hijos para que sean profesionales para el día de mañana sus sueños son de invertir mas su inventario para que llegue a ser una gran distribuidora ya que le gustaría tener una amplia variedad de productos sus deseos son que Dios le genere mas vida para llegara  conocer sus nietos por lo que ahorita sus hijos están estudiando y ellos logren finalizar sus carreras y mas tarde puedan formar su propia familia y así podrán tomar decisiones para el día de mañana.

La actividad económica a la que se dedica es una pulpería, la ubicación de su negocio es en su casa de habitación, el tiempo que tiene de poseer su negocio es de 8 años, Doña Estebana inicia este negocio con el objetivo de apoyar en los gastos de su familia por lo que este negocio nace de forma ambulante ya que ella empezó ofreciendo sus productos en las calles y algunas veces recurría algunos centros de estudios ya que la mayoría de sus clientes eran niños y así inicio su idea de mantener su negocio de forma estable y este tendría lugar en su casa de habitación por lo que no fue fácil al principio y necesitaba el apoyo de sus familia ya que inicio con pocos productos como: paletas, bombones, caramelos, bolsitas  y refrescos naturales y sus clientes ivan en busca de mas productos por lo que decide realizar un financiamiento para incrementar su pulpería y este le sirvió de ayuda y es así como ha ido mejorando en su negocio por lo que ahora solicita otro financiamiento ya que ahora necesita suplir su negocio de artículos escolares ya que sus clientes ya están solicitando todo tipo de útiles necesarios para el colegio.
texts.en:
Estebana de la Concepción López V. is 40 years old and married. Estebana has two sons: the elder is 18 and in his fifth year of high school and the younger is 15 and in his fourth year of high school. Her husband works as a farmer. She wants to keep her business going as she needs to continue sending her sons to school so that they can have careers. She dreams of investing in her inventory so that she can become a major distributor as she would like to have a wide variety of products. She hopes that God will keep her alive long enough for her to know her grandchildren because now her sons are studying. She hopes her children will have careers and only after that start their own families, and in this way make decisions about their future. She owns a grocery store, which she runs from her home. She has had this business for eight years. Estebana started the business to help pay the household expenses. She began as a street vendor, offering her products in the streets and sometimes near schools as most of her customers were children. She had the idea to stabilize her business and that she could locate it in her home. In the beginning is was not easy and she needed her family's help as she started with a limited variety of goods such as lollipops, chocolates, sweets, soft drinks and fresh fruit shakes. Her clients were always looking for more products and so she decided to borrow in order to expand her grocery store and this helped her. In this manner she has been improving her business and she is now asking for this loan to stock her store with school supplies as her customers are now asking for products for school.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: capital de trabajo

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Aunque actualmente se encuentra buscando un local para abrir una pastelería-panadería, Hilda no deja de encargarse de sus dos negocios que llevan aproximadamente hace diez años de funcionamiento.

Hilda se dedica a la venta de ropa y también de cosméticos por pedido. Empezó vendiendo cosméticos pero en una oportunidad tuvo un problema con el pago de los productos se animo también a vender ropa a domicilio. Es así que hoy vende según los pedidos que le hagan ropa y también productos de belleza. 


Felizmente le va bien en sus dos negocios. Pero Hilda siempre piensa engrande es por ello que junto con su hijo esta planeando inaugurar una pastelería-panadería dentro de algunos meses.
texts.en:
Although she's looking for space to open a combined bakery-pastry shop, Hilda hasn't stopped working at the two businesses that she's operated for about 10 years. She makes a living selling clothes and cosmetics. She started out selling cosmetics but when she had a problem with a payment she started selling clothes too. That's how she's come to making clothes that she sells to order along with beauty products. Happily, her businesses are going well. However, Hilda has always thought big and that's why she's working together with her son to set up the new bakery-pastry shop, a business that she hopes to open within a few months.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy products to resell.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es:
A la vivienda del señor Juan José G. le está haciendo falta el piso de concreto de un cuarto para tenerla ya terminado y así sus tres hijos tengan su propio espacio ya que están en edad escolar.
 Don Juan José G. trabaja en una maquiladora en el aria de técnico de calidad este es su ingreso familia y con el desea pagar este crédito. 
El día que fuimos a ser la visita del domicilio del señor Juan José G. no se encontraba estaba en su trabaja es por eso que en la foto aparece su esposa la señora  Juana María Hernández.
texts.en:
Mr. Juan José G.’s home needs a concrete floor in a room to finish it so his three children may have their own space as they are now school-aged. Juan José G. works in a factor as a quality technician and this is his family’s income with which he will pay back this loan. The day we went to visit Juan José G. in his home he wasn’t there as he was at work so his wife, Juana María Hernández, appears in the photo.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Concrete floor

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Luz R. trabaja actualmente en un salón de belleza junto con una amiga. Hasta hace un mes ella manejaba sola su negocio en un local alquilado. No obstante, la dueña de este local decidió usar el espacio para otros fines, por lo que ella tuvo que asociarse con una compañera.

Al verse en problemas Luz no tuvo otra opción además de continuar trabajando en lo mismo, ya que con su larga experiencia de treinta y cinco años se ha convertido en una experta y piensa que es lo mejor que puede hacer. 

Por ahora lo que ella más desea es crecer En su nuevo negocio junto con su amiga.
texts.en:
Luz R. now works in a beauty salon with a friend. Until a month ago, she operated her own business in a rented shop. However, the owner of the shop decided to use it for something else and Luz had to partner with a friend. When she saw the trouble she was in, Luz had no other choice than to go on working because her long thirty-five year experience has made her an expert and she thinks that it is the best that she can do. For now, what she most wants is to grow her new business along with her friend.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy products for beauty salon business.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
El señor Alejandro R., tiene su casita pero el detalle es que solo tiene una recamara, desea construir un cuarto mas en la casa no cuenta con el dinero necesario para comprar el material. 
 Él esta solicitando para empezar la construcción, sus ingresos proviene como operador D. una maquiladora en esta ciudad, el no pagara mano D. obra, porque también sabe D. construcción y realizara la mejora en horas adicionales a su empleo.
 Estará muy agradecido por el apoyo recibido por ustedes, cuando realizamos la visita al domicilio del señor Alejandro no se encontraba estaba en su trabaja es por eso que en la foto sale su esposa e hijos quienes fueron los que nos atendieron.
texts.en:
Mr. Alejandro R. has a small home but it only has one bedroom. He wishes to build another room but doesn’t have the necessary funds to buy the materials. He is asking for a loan to start construction. His income as a factory worker in this city provides his income. He won’t pay labor because he also knows construction and can make the home improvement when he isn’t working. He will be very grateful for your support. When we visited his home Alejandro wasn’t there as he was at work so we met with his wife and children and they are in the photograph.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Build a room onto his home.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es:
La señora Noemí Rodríguez  y su esposa el señor Santos Guadalupe son padres de familia tiene cuatro hijos a los cuales quieren darles lo mejor.
 Con dos créditos anteriores con FVP a hecho mejorar a su casa, pero le están haciendo falta las protecciones en ventanas y puertas, ya que fue victima de un robo y quiere la seguridad para sus hijos. 
Solicita este préstamo y planea pagarlo con los ingresos de su trabajo como vendedora de viviendas.
texts.en:
Mrs. Noemí Rodríguez and her husband Mr. Santos Guadalupe are parents of four children to whom they wish to give the very best. With previous loans from FVP they have made home improvements, but they are missing security protection on their windows and doors, and as they were robbed they want security for their children. They are seeking this loan and plan to repay it with their income from her work as a realtor.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Add security bars on the windows and doors.

loans.name: Pablo Eduardo

texts.es:
El señor Pablo Eduardo junto con su esposa la señora Ana Cecilia Arreola tiene tres hijos que son pequeños de edad escolar, están solicitando un préstamo para construir la barda al rededor de su casa, y así darles más protección y seguridad a su familia.
 Don Pablo Eduardo trabaja como operario en una maquiladora y su esposa también trabaja
en una fabrica como empleada de producción, estos son su ingresos de su familia y con el cual planean pagar el préstamo.
texts.en:
Mr. Pablo Eduardo, along with his wife Mrs. Ana Cecilia Arreola, has three young school-aged children. They are asking for a loan to build a wall around their home to provide greater security and protection to their family. Pablo Eduardo works as an operator in a factory and his wife also works in the factory as a production employee. This is their family income which they will use to repay the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Build a wall around their home.

loans.name: Turqueza Group

texts.es:
La asociación Turquesa trabaja en el centro focal Villa Exaltación ubicado en la ciudad de El Alto. A la fecha el grupo consta de 12 miembros, todos realizan sus actividades internas de manera  responsable. 
Diversos son los negocios que tiene la asociación, por ejemplo María reparte víveres a  tiendas   de barrio, Richard se dedica a la venta de llantas para automóviles y otros accesorios, además también se dedican a la  venta de comida, en snacks y puestos, otras socias tienen tiendas de barrio. Desean ampliar sus ventas, por lo que necesitan mayores créditos para la compra de productos en mayor cantidad, de esta manera generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
The "Turquesa" group works in the downtown area of Villa Exaltación in El Alto. There are 12 members in the group, and they all conduct their respective business responsibly. They have a variety of businesses; for example, María distributes food to neighbourhood stores; Richard sells car tires and other accessories; other members sell food in snackbars and stalls or own stores in the neighbourhood. They want to increase their sales and are asking for this loan to buy goods in bulk so that they can generate higher revenues.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy goods in bulk

loans.name: Wipala Group

texts.es:
La artesanía y chifelria son las principales actividades de la asociación  Wipala, confeccionan tejidos de aguayo, mochilas en aguayo y cuero, estuches para guitarra, billeteras, estuches para lápices; por otro lado las denominadas chifleras, se dedican a la elaboracion de amuletos, productos para atraer la buena suerte o para atraer el y lo que pida el cliente, una vez elaborados sus productos los comercializan en los departamentos de  Cochabamba y santa cruz, solo los martes y viernes  en ferias.
La asociación Wipala trabaja en el centro focal Los Andes hace cuatro años. A la cabeza de Basilia  C. forman un grupo muy unido ya que a lo largo del tiempo formaron una simpática amistad entre ellas. Ahora ellas necesitan comprar materia prima para ampliar su producción, de esta manera obtendrán mayores ventas y generaran mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Crafts and home remedies are the main activities of the members of the Wipala group. Some members weave aguayos [ traditional Andean textiles to carry small children], make backpacks of aguayo and leather, guitar cases, wallets, pencil cases. Those "chifleras" of the group make amulets, products to bring good luck or attract the person or thing the customer desires. Once their products are made they sell them in the areas of Cochabamba and Santa Cruz on market days, which are Tuesdays and Fridays. The Wipala group has been together for four years in the downtown area of Los Andes. They are a very united group and as they have been together for a long time, they have become friends with each other. Now they need to buy more of the raw materials for their businesses so that they can make more sales and generate more revenue.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy the raw materials to make their handcrafted items.

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es: El señor Adrian labora para una tienda de un conocido servicio medico desde hace mas de 18 años como administrador del negocio, el tiene un proyecto el cual es la construcción de un techo de madera en el patio para proteger su automóvil de la lluvia  por tal motivo esta solicitando este crédito, ya que asi le brinda mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Adrian has worked for a well-known medical service store for more than 18 years as the manager. He has a project to build a wooden roof on the patio to protect his car from the rain so he is seeking this loan. The roof will provide greater comfort to his family.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Build a wooden roof

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand her fish-vending business.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
“A hardworking mother” is the best way to describe Flora L., a 59-year-old resident of Poblacion Municipality. Sapang Dalaga, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Flora has seven children and is married to a carpenter whose earnings aren’t sufficient to meet their daily needs, so about a year ago she opened a food stand known as a carenderia in the Philippines.

In order to sustain and nurture her family, especially her loving children, Flora hopes to increase her profits through an expansion of the business. These enlarged profits will also allow her to send her son to college.

For Flora to realize this expansion, she is requesting a loan of $175. This money will also serve as an aid in buying meat, rice toppings and all the ingredients, utensils and equipment needed in the food stand.  

Flora ultimately hopes to live a comfortable life with her family.

loans.use: To expand her business and purchase additional ingredients for new menus.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Mrs. Rita R. lives in Mansabay, Lopez Jaena. She is married and has 9 kids. Her husband is a fisherman who never gets tired working to support their big family. In 2000, she applied for membership to Paglaum MPC. Hearing all the benefits of being a member, she never hesitated to become one. She maintains the status of member in good standing; she always repays her loans in a timely manner.

Recently, Rita requested financial assistance amounting to PHP 10,000 for additional working capital for fishing. She makes use of teared foam in their fish vending. She hopes to buy new ones. Through this project, she believes she can raise more income and be of help for the expansion of their business. Rita has found assistance for their financial needs through Paglaum MPC and she is thankful with all her heart.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing accessories

location.town: Mansabay Alto, Lopez Jaena , Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Rajabgul

texts.ru: Бобохонова Раджабгуль жительница города Яван. Живет далеко от центра района. Основной видж деятельности в той зоне , это животноводство. Кроме того этот бизнес является единственным источником дохода ее семьи. Имеет коровник и несколько голов бычков. Узнав про возможность получения кредита , решила обратиться к нам и получить кредит сроком на 12 месяцев. Таким образом она сможет купить двух молодых телят и увеличить поголовье скота и этим сможет развивать свой бизнес.Раджабгуль замужем и имеет четверых детей.Живут очень дружно и весело.
texts.en:
Rajabgul B. is a resident of Yavan. She lives far from the center of the region. The main business type in her zone is raising livestock. In addition, this business is the sole source of income for her family. Rajabgul has a cowshed and several bulls. After finding out about the possibility of getting a loan, Rajabgul decided to turn to us and to take out a 12 month loan. This way she will be able to purchase two young calves and to expand her business. Rajabgul is married and has 4 children. Her family lives together happily.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase cattle headcount

loans.name: Dina

texts.en:
Dina S., 41, is happy tending her little store. She has bravely raised her 2 kids together with her husband who is a butcher. The store is her means of earning a living to help her husband support the family. Fortunately, her store is located in a populous neighborhood and so she makes promising daily sales.

Dina insists on running the store even though other stores have mushroomed in their place. Dina believes that with support, as one family they will sustain and beat the competition. Dina has reached her 4th year of being a member of Paglaum MPC. She has applied for a loan of PHP 15,000 for the store. Expanding her inventory will surely mean additional income. She has confidence that she can maintain the label of member in good standing. "It's already tested," she said. She is a hard-working mother and wishes to sustain the store and from there the best education she can afford for her children.

loans.use: additional capital for her "sari-sari" store

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru: Гулова Малика жительница города Яван. Возраст 38 лет, замужем и имеет семерых детей. Семья очень большая , поэтому для того. чтобы ее прокормить ей и ее мужу приходится много работать. Она сама занимается земледелием . На участке земли , который они имеют она сажает картофель, урожай которого частично идет на рынок и продается оптом , а часть оставляет себе. планируемый кредит хочет использовать для того , чтобы закупить семена картофеля. Погасить кредит сможет в течение 8 месяцев.
texts.en:
Malika G. lives in the town of Yavan. She is 38 years old, married and has seven children. Her family is very large and to sustain it she and her husband have to work a lot. She is in agriculture. They have a plot of land where they plant potatoes and then they sell part of the harvest on the market and keep the other part for themselves. Malika plans to use the loan to buy potato seeds. She will be able to pay off the loan within 8 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy potato seeds

loans.name: Shodi

texts.ru: Козиев Шоди живет со своей семьей в самом отдаленном кишлаке города Яван. Занимается земледелием , а так же животноводством , то есть купле продажей мелко и крупно рогатого скота. Кредит планирует использовать для того, чтобы закупить сено и другие виды комбикорма для своих животных. Погасить кредит сможет в течение 12 месяцев. Шоди 47 лет и опыт  в данном бизнесе составляет 18 лет. У него большая семья , где растут четверо очень работящих детей детей.
texts.en:
Shodi Q. lives with his family in the most distant village outlying Yavan City. He farms and raises livestock, raising cattle which he then sells. He plans to take out a loan to purchase hay and other feed for his cattle. He can repay the credit within 12 months. He is 47 years old and has been raising cattle for 18 years. He has a big family, raising four very industrious children.

Translated from Russian by Josh Machleder, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of cattle feed

loans.name: Maisara

texts.ru: Намозова Майсара , жительница города Яван. Возраст 38 лет, замужем и имеет двоих детей. Муж уехал в Россию на заработки и она занялась бизнесом. Торгует на рынке овощами и фруктами. Занимается этим делом уже четыре года. Кредит планирует получить и использовать его для того, чтобы закупить ящики , арендовать складские помещения , а так же увеличить товарооборот. Погасить кердит сможет в течение 10 месяцев.
texts.en:
Maisara N. lives in the town of Yavan. She is 38 years old, married and has two children. Her husband went to Russia to find work and she has started own business. She sells fruits and vegetables on the market. She has been doing this for four years already. She plans to get a loan and use it to buy boxes and rent a storage space as well as increase circulation of produce. Maisara will pay off the loan within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase produce circulation

loans.name: Elecita

texts.en:
Elecita S., 47 is from Mansabay Bajo, Lopez Jaena. She is a single parent and bravely raised her 3 children. PMPC supported her by lending her the capital to start her piggery business. She sold one pig at a time, helping the family survive. She gave her best efforts to produce good pigs, in order to sell them continuously.

Elecita is now trying to expand her piggery business and has a thought of venturing into opening a little restaurant. She presented her project proposal to Paglaum MPC to finance the project and has applied for a loan of PHP 15,000. She is thankful to Paglaum MPC for financing her capital needs. In addition, she wants her business to show up and build a good business management for her loyal customers.With her extra income, she wishes to send all her children to school and have them find stable careers.

loans.use: additional capital for her restaurant and piggery

location.town: Mansabay Bajo Lopez Jaena Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Faizali

texts.ru: Партобов Файзали житель города Яван. Возраст 51 год, женат и имеет четверых детей. Уже 8 лет занимается дехканским хозяйством, а так же имеет тракор , который использует для вспашки земель . Работает сам на этом тракторе за плату. Хорошую прибыль получает в сезон , но в данный момент произошла поломка и его машине требуется срочный ремонт. Получив кредит он сможет сделать ремонт и выйти на работу. Полгасить кредит сможет в течение десяти месяцев.
texts.en:
Faizali P. resides in the town of Yavan. He is 51 years old, married and has four children. For the past eight years he has worked in small-scale farming, and in addition has a tractor that he uses for plowing the land. Faizali rents out his tractor and his services and makes a good profit, but the work is seasonal and at present his tractor has broken down and is urgently in need of repair. With this loan he will be able to effect the repairs and go back to work. He will be able to repay the loan within ten months.

Translated from Russian by Joyce ., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Tractor repair

loans.name: Pardaqul

texts.ru: Раджабов Пардакул житель города Яван. Живет очень далеко от центра города. Семью обеспечивает путем разведения и продажи крупно рогатого скота. Занимается этим видом бизнеса уже 8 лет. Кредит планирует использовать для того, чтобы закупить еще одного молодого бычка. Пардакул женат и имеет шестерых детей. Старшие дети занимаются земледелием и засеивают различного рода злаковые культуры.
texts.en:
Pardaqul R. resides in the town of Yavan, but lives quite far from the center of town. He supports his family by breeding and selling cattle, and has been in this sort of business for the past eight years. He is planning to use the loan to purchase an additional young bull. Pardaqul is married and has six children. The older children work in farming, planting various kinds of cereal grains.

Translated from Russian by Joyce ., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Cattle Breeding

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy accesories and equipment needed for fishing

loans.name: Consolacion

texts.en:
Mrs. Consolacion Q., 38 years old, married and a resident of San Vicente, Dapitan City. Her husband is a tricycle (three-wheeled vehicle) driver, transporting passengers. They have 5 children of whom 2 are in school. Starting with 3,000PHP in working capital, Mrs. Q. was able to expand with the help of Paglaum Cooperative. Aside from financial assistance, she was able to generate savings and enjoys the benefits given by the coop. She became a member in April 2007 and has received a loan 3 times already.

Now, she is applying for 10,000PHP to buy additional stock for her "sari-sari" store, particularly basic commodities. In the future, she wants to own a mini-mart someday and will be fully satisfied if she sees her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase additional merchandise for sale

loans.name: Gaibullo

texts.ru: Саидов Гайбулло житель города Яван. Занимается тенм , что обеспечивает мясом рынок города. То есть он откармливает бычков и сдает их на мясо. Процесс откормки составляет до 50 дней. Затем уже откормившихся животных он сдает на рынок. Занимается этим бизнесом уже 4 года. Бизнес приносит хороший доход , но для того , чтобы увеличить товарооборот он планирует получить кредит сроком на 10 месяцев. Гайбулло 28 лет , он женат и имеет двоих детей.
texts.en:
Gaibullo S. resides in Yavan town. He is a meat supplier. He raises bull calves and sells them to the local market. This process takes up to 50 days. He has been in this business for four years. The business is profitable. However, in order to increase cash flow, Gaibullo would like to receive a loan for ten months. Gaibullo is 28 years old and is married with two children.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to increase cash flow

loans.name: Helenda

texts.en:
Mrs. Helenda T.,46 years old, is married and a resident of Mansabay Bajo, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental. Her husband is a fisherman.The fish caught by her husband are sold at the public market or to their neighbors. Because they want to buy additional materials for fishing like fishing nets, they both agreed to request a loan through Paglaum MPC in the amount of 10,000Php.

Aside from the financial assistance they have received, they have also enjoyed other benefits like insurance, etc. Mrs. T. believes that with Paglaum's help and her patience and hard work, she will be a successful vendor someday.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for fishing

location.town: Mansabay Bajo Lopez Jaena Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Mrs. Norma P., is 58 years old and a resident of Mansabay Bajo, Lopez Jaena, Mis.Occ. She has 2 kids and one is in college.She owns a "sari-sari store" (small grocery store) that forms part of their house where neighbors are their customers.

Since she already has a college student, Norma decided to improve their small business to support their children better. So she requested a loan at Paglaum MPC in the amount of 10,000Php. Aside from the financial assistance, she also receives add-on benefits like insurance, savings, etc. She believes that with Paglaum's help, she will become a successful businesswoman someday.

loans.use: additional capital for her "sari-sari" store

location.town: Mansabay Bajo Lopez Jaena Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en:
Mrs. Beatriz T., 48 years old, is married and lives at Galas, Dipolog City. Their source of income comes from their “sari-sari” (mini-grocery) store. She manages the store and her husband is the cook for their “carenderia” (small restaurant). Her child is in 1st year college already. 

Beatriz joined Paglaum MPC just this year because of the benefits given to members. She also is applying for 10,000PHP to buy additional grocery items like basic commodities for sale. She looks forward that someday her sari-sari will be a real grocery store with a restaurant and a videoke bar.

loans.use: To buy basic commodities for re-sale

loans.name: Roberta

texts.en:
Mrs. Roberta S., 34 years old, is married and lives at Irasan, Roxas, Zamboanga del Norte. She has 4 children and 3 of them are in school. Because they lived at the seashore, the only means to earn a living is through fishing, so her husband is a fisherman. Despite strong winds and heavy rains, her husband still goes fishing to earn a living and survive. Mrs. S. will be the one to sell his catch wherever she can.

Because of financial problems, Mrs. S. decided to join Paglaum MPC to obtain financial assistance, but she was happy knowing that, aside from that assistance, she will be able to save part of her income and have other benefits offered by the Cooperative. Now, she is requesting a loan of 5,000PHP to purchase additional fishing nets to be able to catch more fish. Her greatest desire is to see her children finish their studies and live a comfortable life ahead.

loans.use: To buy additional fishing nets

loans.name: Hairiddin

texts.ru: Саидов Хайриддин жиьтель города Яван.Возраст 32 года , имеет шестерых детей. Работает на стройке подсобным рабочим и его заработной платы не хватает на такую большую семью. Поэтому у него есть небольшое хозяйство , где он оразводит бычков . Теперь он решил получить кредит и использовать его на покупку дойной коровы. Получаемое молоко он будет реализовывать на рынке . Это немного улучшит его положение . Погасть кредит сможет в течение восьми месяцев.
texts.en:
Hairiddin S. resides in Yavan town. He is 32 years old and has 6 children. He is a helper at a construction site and his income is not enough to support his large family. Therefore he raises bull calves. Hairiddin decided to get a loan for buying a milk cow. Selling milk at the local market would help improve his financial situation. Hairiddin would be able to pay off the loan within eight months.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Mehrinisso

texts.ru: Юсупова Мехриниссо жительница города яван. Возраст 42 года , имеет семерых детей. Занимается земледелием всю свою жизнь. Так как это помогает снабжать семью необходимыми злаковыми культурами. Муж работае  на стройке в городе Душанбе. а урожай , который зарабатывает она , она использует для своей семьи , но частично она продает  на рынке.Планируемый кредит хочет использовать для того . чтобы закупить семена. Погасить кредит сможет в течение восьми месяцев.
texts.en:
Mehrinnisso U. lives in Yavan town. She is 42 years old and has 7 children. Her husband is a construction worker in Dushanbe. All her life Mehrinnisso has worked in agriculture. This helps her provide grain to her family. She sells part of the harvest at the market and uses the rest for consumption. She plans to get a loan for buying seeds. She would pay off the loan within 8 months.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase seeds

loans.name: Safarmo

texts.ru: азизова Сафармо жительница города яван . Проживает вместе со своим мужем и его родителями . Имеет одного ребенка. Занимается торговлей молока . Она имеет Двух коов , которые дают молоко . Получаемую продукцию она сдает оптом  на рынке. Кредит планирует использовать для того . чтобы закупить сено и другие виды корма . Это даст возможность получать качественное молоко и таким образом привлечь новых клиентов. Погасить кредит сможет в течение 12 месяцев.
texts.en:
Safarmo A. lives in Yavan town. She has one child and lives with her husband and parents-in-law. Safarmo sells milk from her two dairy cows. She sells the milk wholesale at the local market. Safarmo would use the loan for the purchase of hay and other types of fodder. This would help improve the quality of the milk and attract more customers. Safarmo would be able to pay off the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase hay

loans.name: Bobosho

texts.ru: Аликулов Бобошо житель города яван. Возраст 39 лет, женат и имеет четверых детей. Уже долгое время заниаеся торговлей крупно рогатого скота. Скупает животных для откормки , а затем продает на том рынке , но по более высокой цене. Таким образом он обеспечивает семью. На данный момент хочет получить кредит для того , чтобы увеличить поголовье скота. Погасить кредит сможет в течение 12 месяцев.
texts.en:
Bobosho A. lives in Yavan town. He is 39 years old and is married with 4 children. He supports his family by selling livestock. He raises calves and sells them at a higher price at the local market. He has been in this business for a long time. Bobosho would like to get a loan for increasing livestock production. He would be able to pay off the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to increase livestock production

loans.name: Paz

texts.en:
Paz S., 36, is striving to earn a living without a stable job. The education of her three children and their day-to-day consumption is a mountain to survive. Given the situation, she had been playing with the idea of putting up a store selling basic commodities, but she didn't have capital to start up that business. Her husband works at SBU construction but earns just enough for hand-to-mouth needs.

They were thankful that they could join Paglaum MPC. With very little capital, they were able to start their "sari-sari" store business. Their daily sales go that extra mile for the family's needs. They were also able to save with their extra income. They applied to Paglaum MPC for the additional capital of PHP 10,000 as a loan. They were attracted to Paglaum MPC for the savings and insurance services of the cooperative. They want to gradually expand their little store and taste a good life someday.

loans.use: additional capital for her "sari-sari" store

loans.name: Shahlo

texts.ru: Вохидова Шахло жительница города Яван.  Возраст 24 года , замужем , детей пока нет. Не зависимо от занятий мужа , имеет свой бизнес. Занимается птицеводством. Имеет большой курятник , где разводит птиц. Хочет получить кредит для тог, чтобы увеличить бизнес , закупить еще хороших породистых курей , для их разведения. Погасить кредит сможет в течение 10 месяцев.
texts.en:
Shahlo V. resides in Yavan town. She is 24 years old and is married. She has her own business. Shahlo has a large henhouse where she raises poultry. She would like to get a loan for expanding her business by purchasing more and better quality chicken. She would be able to pay off the loan within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to purchase chicken and mixed fodder

loans.name: Sarvaroy

texts.ru: Гулова Сарварой жительница города Яван. Живет со своей семьей очень далеко от центра . Она занимается разведением крупно рогатого скота , а так же торговлей молока. Имеет хорошую породистую корову , коорая дает окола 10 литров молока. Но для того, чтбы увеличить объем получаемой продукции , а так же увеличить прибыль хочет получить кредит и купить еще одну дойную корову. Это поможет ей снизить цену на молоко и таким образом помочь населению покупать дешевле продукт первой необходимости. Погасить кредит сможет в течение 12 месяцев.
texts.en:
Sarvaroy G. resides in the town of Yavan. She lives with her family quite far from the center of town, where she raises cattle, and sells dairy products. Sarvaroy has an excellent breed of cow that gives approximately ten liters of milk; however, in order to increase production volume, as well as profit, she would like a loan to purchase an additional milk cow. This will help her reduce the cost of milk, assisting people in purchasing this staple at a lower price. She will be able to repay the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Joyce ., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of a milk cow
